messages.content: Dear fellow resident, I've heard a lot from the election candidates. But this election's not about them, it's about us. So I asked Sadiq Khan if he could help me tell my story.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has transformed the NHS with extra staff, including 44,000 more doctors and 89,000 more nurses since being elected in 1997, enabling more focus on each patient.
Labour's investment has provided extra teachers and teaching assistants, new classrooms, and investment in IT at St Boniface School.

mentions.candidate: As a dad married to a working mum, I know Sadiq understands these concerns.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Only the Tories would make her lose out because I'm not married - it proves to me that they haven't changed.

issues.education: You can really see the difference Labour's investment has made, with extra teachers and teaching assistants, new classrooms and investment in IT.
issues.health: So I've seen first-hand how Labour has transformed the NHS. There are all the new facilities at St George's.

housing.content: As a key worker, they've enabled me to get on the property ladder and buy a home of my own. And they introduced tax credits, which are vital help in raising my daughter Ella and ensuring I can afford to work.

contactInformation.address: DJ Bellamy on behalf of Sadiq Khan, all of 5B Trinity Road, London, SW17 7RH.

endorsements.endorsement: I've heard a lot from the election candidates. But this election's not about them, it's about us. So I asked Sadiq Khan if he could help me tell my story... I hope you'll be voting to re-elect Sadiq this Thursdayâ€¦ Your vote will decide the future of the NHS, of our schools and of families like mine. Please use it wisely.

images.caption: Photo of Liz McDonnell and her daughter
